GapFillDragDrop.Title: Verbs with two objects
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on a word and drag it to the correct gap.
GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop:
1. The company bought me a new car.
2. The receptionist gave us the keys to the room.
3. I wrote a letter to the bank.
4. She lent me 10 pounds so that I could buy lunch.
5. They showed us the way to the station and we caught the next train.
6. I offered her some help but she didn't want any.
7. She wants to teach me Greek.
8. Can you bring us some ice-creams?
9. He's sent them a postcard and they are delighted.
10. I told him the password.
